widgets.name: Analog Clock
widgets.author: Chris Johnson
widgets.description: A fully customizable analog clock. Two example clocks are included. Please see the ReadMe document for more details.

widgets.name: Background Grid
widgets.author: Chris Johnson
widgets.description: A fully customizable full-screen grid.

widgets.name: NetworkInfo
widgets.author: Chris Johnson
widgets.description: Displays current Ethernet and Wi-Fi status (connected / not connected / IP Address / Mac Address.

widgets.name: SimpleDate
widgets.author: Spencer Kaiser – @spencerkaiser on GitHub
widgets.description: A widget that displays the current date

widgets.name: SpotifyCurrentTrack
widgets.author: ThomasBrace
widgets.description: Displays current track palying in spotify

widgets.name: World Clock
widgets.author: Chris Johnson
widgets.description: A widget that shows multiple timezones in either horizontal or vertical orientation

widgets.name: battery
widgets.author: Johan Bleuzen
widgets.description: Display current battery percentage and status

widgets.name: btceur
widgets.author: @cesckat
widgets.description: Get the last bitcoin price. Now, in EUR (€)

widgets.name: btc
widgets.author: Daniel Spillere Andrade
widgets.description: Get current bitcoin price in USD.

widgets.name: calendar
widgets.author: Adam Vaughan
widgets.description: Display a simple calendar for the current month.

widgets.name: Disk Usage
widgets.author: Adam Courtemanche
widgets.description: Shows disk usage for mounted disks, with the option to exclude specific disks. Update: now with new style in two variants!

widgets.name: Fever RSS count
widgets.author: Martin Ziel
widgets.description: Shows the number of unread RSS articles

widgets.name: German Word of the Day
widgets.author: Tassilo Selover-Stephan
widgets.description: Shows you the german word of the day!

widgets.name: Now Playing in iTunes
widgets.author: Patrick Braiden
widgets.description: Shows the name, artist and album of the current song in iTunes

widgets.name: I/O Stats
widgets.author: Eric Miller
widgets.description: Show current throughput statistics for the specified disk.  Style based on Top CPU and Top MEM widgets by Felix Hageloh.

widgets.name: Load Average
widgets.author: Eric Miller
widgets.description: Display the 1, 5, and 15-minute load averages of your system. Style based on Top CPU and Top MEM widgets by Felix Hageloh.

widgets.name: Unread mail count
widgets.author: Martin Ziel
widgets.description: Shows the number of unread mails in Mail.app

widgets.name: Memory bar
widgets.author: Coby Chapple
widgets.description: A simple system memory usage meter.

widgets.name: Network Throughput
widgets.author: Adam Courtemanche
widgets.description: Shows incoming and outgoing throughput on a user-specified network interface

widgets.name: Pretty Weather
widgets.author: Felix Hageloh
widgets.description: A prettier and simpler weather forcast widget. NOTE: You will need your own forecast.io api key. Please check the README for details.

widgets.name: Public Ip
widgets.author: George Irwin
widgets.description: Displays your current public IP address

widgets.name: roundClock
widgets.author: Evan Bovie
widgets.description: A twist on the traditional analogue clock

widgets.name: simple-clock
widgets.author: Spencer Oberstadt
widgets.description: A big, simple clock

widgets.name: Simple Stocks
widgets.author: Adam Courtemanche
widgets.description: Shows stock information with minimal configuration required (simply specify the symbols)

widgets.name: Swap Usage
widgets.author: Eric Miller
widgets.description: Display swap file metrics for your system. Style based on Top CPU and Top MEM widgets by Felix Hageloh.

widgets.name: Sysmon Set
widgets.author: George Irwin and others
widgets.description: An arrangement of system monitoring widgets.

widgets.name: To Do List
widgets.author: Rich Somerfield
widgets.description: Display a basic todo list on screen

widgets.name: Top CPU
widgets.author: Felix Hageloh
widgets.description: Shows a CPU usage summary.

widgets.name: Top MEM
widgets.author: Felix Hageloh
widgets.description: Shows a memory usage summary.

widgets.name: Weather
widgets.author: Felix Hageloh
widgets.description: A simple weather forcast widget. NOTE: You will need your own forecast.io api key. Please check the README for details.

widgets.name: Wildstar Server Status
widgets.author: Eric Miller
widgets.description: Display server status for the specified Wildstar (MMO) server.  This uses http://wsstatus.com for status

widgets.name: worldcup
widgets.author: Michael Goldmann
widgets.description: Display today's worldcup matches
